statements: SELECT * FROM loyalty_points WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT customer_id, points_earned FROM loyalty_points WHERE points_earned > 100
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp FROM loyalty_points ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT customer_id, points_earned FROM loyalty_points ORDER BY points_earned ASC
SELECT * FROM loyalty_points
SELECT customer_id, transaction_id, points_earned, timestamp FROM loyalty_points WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM loyalty_points WHERE points_earned > 100 ORDER BY points_earned ASC
SELECT customer_id, SUM(points_earned) AS total_points FROM loyalty_points GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_points > 500 ORDER BY total_points DESC
SELECT customer_id, transaction_id, points_earned, timestamp FROM loyalty_points WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY transaction_id ASC, timestamp DESC
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM loyalty_points WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY customer_id
SELECT * FROM LoyaltyPoints;
SELECT customer_id, points_earned FROM LoyaltyPoints ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM CustomerInformation WHERE loyalty_level = 3;
SELECT customer_name, email, loyalty_level FROM CustomerInformation ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_level, email FROM CustomerInformation WHERE loyalty_level > 1 AND loyalty_level < 5 ORDER BY loyalty_level ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM CustomerInformation;
SELECT customer_name, email, loyalty_level FROM CustomerInformation ORDER BY loyalty_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInformation WHERE loyalty_level > 2;
SELECT customer_name, points_earned FROM CustomerInformation JOIN LoyaltyPoints ON CustomerInformation.customer_id = LoyaltyPoints.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, points_earned FROM CustomerInformation JOIN LoyaltyPoints ON CustomerInformation.customer_id = LoyaltyPoints.customer_id WHERE points_earned > 50 ORDER BY points_earned ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 3 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_spent FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 100;
SELECT customer_id, earn_id, points_earned FROM points_earned WHERE earn_id < 5;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_transactions > 1000;

SELECT customers.customer_name, transactions.transaction_date, points_earned.points_earned FROM customers INNER JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id INNER JOIN points_earned ON transactions.transaction_id = points_earned.transaction_id;

SELECT customers.customer_name, SUM(points_earned.points_earned) AS total_points_earned FROM customers INNER JOIN points_earned ON customers.customer_id = points_earned.customer_id GROUP BY customers.customer_name ORDER BY total_points_earned DESC;
SELECT * FROM loyal_customers;
SELECT customer_name, points_earned FROM loyal_customers ORDER BY points_earned DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(points_earned) AS total_points FROM loyal_customers GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT reward_name, points_required FROM rewards WHERE points_required BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY reward_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, points_earned FROM loyal_customers;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_amount, customer_id FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT rewards.reward_name, points_required, loyal_customers.customer_name FROM rewards INNER JOIN loyal_customers ON rewards.points_required < loyal_customers.points_earned;
SELECT SUM(points_earned), SUM(points_spent) FROM points_history GROUP BY customer_id HAVING SUM(points_earned) > SUM(points_spent);
SELECT * FROM LoyaltyMembers;
SELECT customer_name, points_earned FROM LoyaltyMembers ORDER BY points_earned DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT reward_name, required_points FROM Rewards WHERE required_points < 500;
SELECT history_id, points_change, history_date FROM LoyaltyPointsHistory ORDER BY history_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM LoyaltyMembers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, points_earned FROM LoyaltyMembers WHERE loyalty_id = 1;
SELECT T.transaction_id, R.reward_name, T.transaction_amount FROM Transactions T JOIN Rewards R ON T.transaction_amount >= R.required_points;
SELECT L.customer_name, L.points_earned, TH.points_change FROM LoyaltyMembers L LEFT JOIN LoyaltyPointsHistory TH ON L.loyalty_id = TH.loyalty_id;
SELECT R.reward_name, R.required_points, TR.transaction_id FROM Rewards R INNER JOIN TransactionsToRewards TR ON R.reward_id = TR.reward_id ORDER BY TR.transaction_id ASC;
